title: Neff Surf Rider Jordy Smith in Dustin'
description: Neff Surf Team Rider Jordy Smith carves winter waves in his latest edit for Neff. This clip features Jordy shredding the swell in California, Africa, France, and Portugal. Be sure to head over to http://www.neffheadwear.com/surf to get all the latest news on Jordy and the rest of the Neff Surf Team.
